content: {"locationId": "12279", "organizationId": "9651", "name": "Grand Prairie United Charities", "address1": "1417 Densman St", "address2": "", "city": "Grand Prairie", "state": "TX", "zipCode": "75051", "country": null, "phone": "972-262-2014", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://gpuc.org", "latitude": "32.73563", "longitude": "-96.9848", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Grand Praire, COUNTY:  Collin, Dallas, Delta, Ellis, Fannin, Grayson, Hopkins, Hunt, Kaufman, Lamar, Navarro, Rockwall", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "              We are committed to fostering a compassionate community where every family has the resources they need to thrive.    Our mission is to empower families by providing essential support through food distribution, emergency financial assistance and a steadfast commitment to bring hope to anyone wtihin the City of Grand Prairie, which is the only area we serve, who has fallen on hard times.        Together we strive to build a brighter future for all   members of our community in Grand Prairie.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Eunice Jimenez", "contactPhone": "972-262-2014", "contactEmail": "eunice.jimenez@gpuc.org", "servicePrograms": "SNAP Application Assistance", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 81, "regionName": "Crossroads Community Services", "logoBlobNameSmall": "ac274016-02a8-47c4-9dcc-740514230b5b.png", "website": "https://ccsdallas.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["None-None (Call for Information)", "Monday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Tuesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 9:00 AM-1:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
